definition: fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure

sentences.english: The right style of swimsuit can help by hiding bulges .
sentences.chinese: 款式适当的游泳衣有助于掩饰肥胖部位。

sentences.english: If you are overweight or obese, your doctor should test you periodically for a pre-diabetic condition called glucose intolerance.
sentences.chinese: 如果你超重或肥胖，你的医生会检测你得糖耐量。

sentences.english: Along with being a risk factor for coronary artery disease, obesity may increase your risk of developing an arrhythmia.
sentences.chinese: 肥胖会增加患有冠心病的危险，由此导致心律失常。

sentences.english: The financial impact of treating obesity and obesity-related disease is substantial.
sentences.chinese: 注入肥胖症的财务冲击和与肥胖有关的疾病是可观的。

sentences.english: The financial impact of treating obesity and obesity-related disease is substantial.
sentences.chinese: 注入肥胖症的财务冲击和与肥胖有关的疾病是可观的。

sentences.english: Increased epicardial fat correlates with increasing total body fat.
sentences.chinese: 心外膜脂肪量增加与肥胖有关。

sentences.english: It fights obesity, diabetes, and heart disease all day.
sentences.chinese: 早餐整天都与肥胖症，糖尿病，心脏病做斗争。

sentences.english: High sugar consumption has been linked to obesity and other health concerns.
sentences.chinese: 高糖摄食已经导致了肥胖和其他健康问题。

sentences.english: Neutered cats are thought to be at particular risk of obesity.
sentences.chinese: 阉割后的猫被认为特别容易出现肥胖现象。

sentences.english: Only Colorado and Washington, D.C., had obesity rates under 20 percent.
sentences.chinese: 只有科罗拉多州和华盛顿州的肥胖率在20%以下。

sentences.english: Obesity can also contribute to sleep apnea.
sentences.chinese: 肥胖也会导致睡眠呼吸暂停。

sentences.english: To adiposity have very good clear grease effect reducing weight.
sentences.chinese: 对肥胖具有很好减肥清脂作用。

sentences.english: He adds that this epidemic of severe obesity is too extensive to be tackled with just medications.
sentences.chinese: 他补充说，重度肥胖这种流行病仅靠药物难以解决。

sentences.english: They are like little, very fat, white worms.
sentences.chinese: 他们象肥胖的白色小虫。

sentences.english: Plumpness seems to run in the family.
sentences.chinese: 肥胖似乎是这家庭中的特色。

sentences.english: They may offer hope in the battle to control the current obesity epidemic.
sentences.chinese: 它们可能在控制当前肥胖病的流行的斗争中提供希望。

definition: to put on weight/to get fat
chronic illness/disease that takes effect slowly

pinyin: dong4 mai4 zhou1 yang4 ying4 hua4
